mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.hospital_id AS hospitalId,A.hospital_name AS hospitalName,A.department_id AS departmentId,A.department_name AS departmentName,A.doctor_id AS doctorId,A.doctor_name AS doctorName,A.patient_name AS patientName,A.user_id AS userId,A.patient_sex AS patientSex,A.patient_age AS patientAge,A.patient_birthday AS patientBirthday,A.patient_idcard_num AS patientIdcardNum,A.patient_phone AS patientPhone,A.patient_job AS patientJob,A.diagnose_time AS diagnoseTime,A.allergy_history AS allergyHistory,A.base_condition AS baseCondition,A.diagnose_tags AS diagnoseTags,A.prescription AS prescription,A.medical_total_price AS medicalTotalPrice,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

,d.name AS departmentName, h.whole_name AS hospitalName, d1.username AS doctorName, d2.code_name AS patientJobName, IF(patient_sex = 1,'男',(IF(patient_sex = 2,'女',''))) AS patientSexName
,da.logic_status AS applyStatus

LEFT JOIN hospital h ON A.hospital_id = h.id LEFT JOIN department d ON A.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN doctor d1 ON A.doctor_id = d1.id LEFT JOIN dict d2 ON d2.code = A.patient_job
LEFT JOIN diagnose_apply da ON A.id = da.diagnose_id AND da.apply_doctor_id = #{doctorIdForApply}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
